headline: Riley Permian Names Bobby Saadati to Board of Directors
summary: Riley Exploration Permian, Inc. (NYSE American: REPX) ("Riley Permian" or the "Company"), today announced that Bobby Saadati has been named as an independent member of its board of directors, effective February 4, 2026.
